name: Retain Author
author: David Powell

sections.description: Retain Author allows you to force your “next” and “previous” blog posts to stay within the same category and the same author.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the ‘retainAuthor.zip’ file
  2. Copy the ‘retainAuthor’ folder to your plugins folder
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Select the categories that will retain the author found under the ‘Settings’ menu under ‘Retain Author’
sections.faq:
Can I select more than one category?

Yes, use ctrl+click or shift+click to select multiple categories

short_description: Prevent mixing authors in your next and previous post links.
description: Retain Author allows you to force your “next” and “previous” blog posts to stay within the same category and the same author.

upgrade_notice: Upgrade is only needed if the plugin stops responding correctly after a wordpress update.
